data.actual_result: It's in the second position in the server list and when you force close and reopen Discord, it moves back to top again.
data.expected_result: It's in the top of the server list.
data.short_description: When you make changes in role overrides or create new roles (or basically anything related to roles) in a freshly created server just after you join a new server, the server moves to the second place in the server list and when you close and reopen Discord, it moves back to the top.
data.steps_to_repro: - Make sure that you have sorted your server list at least once (ever). - Join a server. - Create a new server. - Open Server settings>Roles. - Keep on spamming the + button until it creates too many roles. - Exit out the server settings. - Observe the position of the server.
